name: > Retrieve Legs
description:
BATTLE THROUGH 5 LEVELS AND A BOSSFIGHT IN 

-- > RETRIEVE LEGS --

> RETRIEVE LEGS is, put simply, a game about retrieving your legs after they have been stolen from you.

Ludum Dare 48 has been hectic, in fact, as I write this I am installing a different version of unity in order to fix a WebGL compile bug involving audio. Last minute changes are abound! 

However! The game (In my opinion) is fun.  Which is pretty cool.

Thank you for playing, we hope you enjoyed, and we hope you rate us well!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/retrieve-legs
